description: Determines the dominant language of the input text for a batch of documents. For a list of languages that Amazon Comprehend can detect, see Amazon Comprehend Supported Languages.

nested_items.name: ResultList
nested_items.description: A list of objects containing the results of the operation. The results are sorted in ascending order by the Index field and match the order of the documents in the input list. If all of the documents contain an error, the ResultList is empty.

nested_items.name: Index
nested_items.description: The zero-based index of the document in the input list.

nested_items.name: Languages
nested_items.description: One or more  DominantLanguage objects describing the dominant languages in the document.

nested_items.name: LanguageCode
nested_items.description: The RFC 5646 language code for the dominant language. For more information about RFC 5646, see Tags for Identifying Languages on the IETF Tools web site.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend has in the accuracy of the detection.

nested_items.name: ErrorList
nested_items.description: A list containing one object for each document that contained an error. The results are sorted in ascending order by the Index field and match the order of the documents in the input list. If there are no errors in the batch, the ErrorList is empty.

nested_items.name: Index
nested_items.description: The zero-based index of the document in the input list.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The numeric error code of the error.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: A text description of the error.
